comments.body:
It looks like this package has python console script entry points. Please add them:

https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html#python-entry-points

and test them under `commands`:

https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html#test-commands

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - hypnotoad_geqdsk = hypnotoad.scripts.hypnotoad_geqdsk:main
